original: Börjesson, Artur, disponent, Halmstad, f. 27/2/92 i Frillesås, Hall. 1., av lantbr. A. P. B. o. Lena Andersson. G. 25 m. Ingeborg Andrup. Barn: Börje f. 28, Per-Henrik 30. — Genomg. folkhögsk., lantmisk. o. agronomkurser, hand-.stud. Förv. v. slakt, i Halmstad 20, anst. i London 22-23, affiled. i Plalmstads slakt :fören. sed. 24, tillika disp. v. Hall. slaktbosk :fören. sed. 37. Red. f. Hall. Lantmannatidn. sed. 26. V. ordf. i styr. f. Sv. exp rslakt rfören. sed. 35, led. av statens jordbr :nd 35-39, av statens livsmrkomm. råd sed. 39 o. chef f. dess slakt :sekt. 40-43, led. av stadsfullm. sed. 28, led. av stads-fullm. beredn:utsk. sed. 43, av hamnstyr. 30-40, suppl. i styr. f. Sydsv. Kraft A-B sed. 44, ordf. i Halmstads stads trafiknd sed. 46, statsrev. Hobby: golf. RVO, Hall. hush:sällsk. stGM, LLA.
translated: Börjesson, Artur, manager, Halmstad, born February 27, 1892 in Frillesås, Halland County, son of farmer A. P. B. and Lena Andersson. Married to Ingeborg Andrup in 1925. Children: Börje born in 1928 and Per-Henrik born in 1930. He attended folk high school, took courses in agriculture and agronomy, and studied business. He trained in slaughterhouses in Halmstad in 1920 and was employed in London from 1922-23. He joined the Halmstad Slaughter Association in 1924 and became its manager in 1937. He was also a member of the board of directors for the Halland Cattle Slaughtering Association. He became the editor of the Halland Farmer newspaper in 1926. He was the vice chairman of the board for the Swedish export slaughter industry association in 1935, a member of the National Board of Agriculture from 1935-39, a member of the National Food Committee from 1939 and chief of its slaughter department from 1940-43. He was a member of the city council from 1928 and a member of the city council planning committee from 1943, a member of the port authority from 1930-40 and a substitute member of the board of directors for Sydsvenska Kraft AB from 1944. He was the chairman of the Halmstad city traffic board from 1946. His hobbies included golf. He received the Order of Vasa, a Commander of the Royal Swedish Patriotic Society, and was a member of the Royal Agricultural Society.

structured.description: Editor of the Halland Farmer newspaper, and a golfer.
